rules_text:
Poisonous 1 [i](Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)[/i]
Whenever Illusory Bushmaster attacks, for each poison counter defending player has, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of Illusory Bushmaster. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
